name: Zhen Li 0026
content: Deep Bit lab Dr. Zhen Li Assistant Professor School of Science and Engineering, CUHKSZ. Future Network of Intelligence Institute, Shenzhen, CUHKSZ Deep Learning based Brain-like Interdisciplinary Transfer technology Lab (Deep Bit Lab) æ·±åº¦æ¯ç¹å®éªå®¤ Our Deep Bit Lab focuses on transfering appealing AI technologies for interdisciplinary researches and brain-like computing. Practical applications of great significances are our motivations. "Passions, interests, believes, creatives and diligences" is the slogan for our Deep Bit Lab. Interests Open World 3D Understanding Autonomous Driving and World Model Embodied AI Medical Big Data Molecular structure Analysis and Design Interdisciplinary Research Education Visiting Scholar, 2018, 2016 TTIC, University of Chicago PhD. in Hong Kong, 2018 University of Hong Kong M.A. in China, 2014 Sun Yat-sen University B.A. in China, 2011 Sun Yat-sen University Open Opportunities We have opening positions for Ph.D., M.phil. (Limited quotas for Ph.D. application, top conferences/journals are required.), Msc and visiting students, which are waiting for self-motivated talents. Please send me (lizhen@cuhk.edu.cn) your resume if you are interested in. news One paper and one workshop accepted by WACV 2026. One paper accepted by npj Digital Medicine . Two papers and one workshop paper accepted by NeurIPS 2025. One paper accepted by Nature Communications . One paper accepted by TNNLS 2025. One paper accepted by TVCG 2025. Four papers accepted by CVPR 2025. Two papers accepted by AAAI 2025. One as Oral . One paper win the 1st Place for ECCV 2024 Corner Case Scene Understanding Challenge. One paper accepted by BIBM 2024. One paper accepted by NeuIPS 2024. One paper accepted by MICCAI 2024. One paper accepted by IJCV 2024. One paper accepted by ECCV 2024. One paper accepted by ICLR 2024. One paper accepted by CVPR 2024. One paper win the "Innovation Award" and 2nd Place for the Predictive World Model of the Autonoumous Grand Challenge at CVPR2024.
